pageContext.claim: “If Vice President @Mike_Pence comes through for us, we will win the Presidency. Many States want to decertify the mistake they made in certifying incorrect & even fraudulent numbers in a process NOT approved by their State Legislatures (which it must be). Mike can send it back!”
pageContext.analysis: Utterly false. The vice president has no such power, as Pence had repeatedly tried to make clear to Trump. No state requested that its certified vote counts be rejected.
